shortDescription: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in WEC Discussion Forum (wec_discussion) extension 2.1.0 and earlier for TYPO3 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors, as exploited in the wild in April 2011.
vulnerabilityName: webempoweredchurch wec_discussion Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
